data.title: IPU PARLINE database: BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA (Dom Naroda), Electoral system
data.meta_description: IPU PARLINE database on national parliaments: BOSNIA AND HERZEGOVINA (Dom Naroda), Electoral system
data.text:
Voting system : The ten delegates from the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina (five Croats and five Muslims) are designated by the delegates of the same communities to the local House of Peoples of the Federation of Bosnia and Herzegovina. Delegates from the Republika Srpska are designated by the National Assembly of that same Republic. Eligibility Qualified electors

- age: 18 years

- citizenship of Bosnia and Herzegovina

- ineligibility: persons serving sentence imposed by International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia, under indictment by the Tribunal or having failed to comply with an appearance order by the Tribunal
